rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Indicates a unit which is part of this Organization, e.g. a Department within a larger FormalOrganization. Inverse of `org:unitOf`.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has Unit
Information Counter
Informationstheke
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A service provided to inform the library users at a service counter.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Individual
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: An object representing a single person or entity
A kind of service that is offered on site at the library.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Local Service
Lokale Dienstleistung
Nutzeranmeldung
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: An action to register a person as a library user and inform it about usage opportunities and conditions.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: User Registration

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: a kind of online service provided to inform the users on the web via chat or email etc.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Internetbasierter Auskunftsdienst
Online Information
Rechercheplatz
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A PC-Station provided for research within the library’s media collection.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Research Station

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: a service provided to generate photographs for the users.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Photo Service
Fotodienst

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The formatted text corresponding to the name of the object
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: formatted name
User Training
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A service provided to train the users in research and use of the library’s media collection.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Nutzerschulung
unit Of
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Indicates an Organization of which this Unit is a part, e.g. a Department within a larger FormalOrganization. This is the inverse of `org:hasUnit`.
The currency for all prices in the gr:PriceSpecification given using the ISO 4217 standard (3 characters).
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has currency (1..1)
Library Service
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A kind of service provided by a library or a related Institution.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Bibliotheksdienstleistung

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: This property links a gr:Location to a gr:OpeningHoursSpecification.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has opening hours specification (0..*)
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: For use in LSO: This property links a lso:Local to a gr:OpeningHoursSpecification.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Einzelarbeitsplatz
Individual Work Space
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A service to provide the opportunity for individual work for a single user.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Web Based Information Service
Internetbasierter Auskunftsdienst
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: a kind of online service provided to inform the users on the web.

An Organization such as a University Support Unit which is part of some larger FormalOrganization and only has full recognition within the context of that FormalOrganization, it is not a Legal Entity in its own right. Units can be large and complex containing other Units and even FormalOrganizations. Alternative names: _OU_ _Unit_ _Department_
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: OrganizationalUnit
has site
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Indicates a site at which the Organization has some presence even if only indirect (e.g. virtual office or a professional service which is acting as the registered address for a company). Inverse of `org:siteOf`.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: PC-Arbeitsplatz
PC Work Station
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A service to provide the opportunity to do work on a PC.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Library Tour
Bibliotheksführung
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A service provided to guide the users through the library building and to show them the potential uses.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Local Information Service
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A kind of service provided to inform the library users on site in the library.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Lokale Informationsvermittlung

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A service to provide space to use the media collection on site at the library, e.g. in a reading room.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Presentation
Präsenzansicht

rdf:Description.dct:description: An Ontology to define a classification of conventional services provided by libraries.
rdf:Description.dct:creator: Matthias Letsch
rdf:Description.dct:title: Library Service Ontology

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: To specify the components of the delivery address for the object
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has address
Opening hours specification
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: This is a conceptual entity that holds together all information about the opening hours on a given day (gr:DayOfWeek).

An office or other premise at which the organization is located. Many organizations are spread across multiple sites and many sites will host multiple locations. In most cases a Site will be a physical location. However, we don't exclude the possibility of non-physical sites such as a virtual office with an associated post box and phone reception service. Extensions may provide subclasses to denote particular types of site.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Site
Lokales Arbeiten
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A service for providing working space and opportunities to the users.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Local Work
Nutzungskondition
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Defines the terms of use for a service.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Condition

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: This specifies the gr:DayOfWeek to which the gr:OpeningHoursSpecification is related...
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has opening hours day of week (1..*)
Web Based Usage Service
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A kind of online service provided to gain access to parts of the media collection on the web.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Internetbasierte Bestandsbenutzung
Gruppenarbeitsraum
Group Work Room
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A service to provide working space for groups of users.
Used to indicate the resource value of an object property that requires property parameters
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has value

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The locality (e.g. city or town) associated with the address of the object
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: locality

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: defines a physical site where a local service is available.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Point of Service
Servicepunkt

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Represents a collection of people organized together into a community or other social, commercial or political structure. The group has some common purpose or reason for existence which goes beyond the set of people belonging to it and can act as an Agent. Organizations are often decomposable into hierarchical structures. It is recommended that SKOS lexical labels should be used to label the Organization. In particular `skos:prefLabel` for the primary (possibly legally recognized name), `skos:altLabel` for alternative names (trading names, colloquial names) and `skos:notation` to denote a code from a code list. Alternative names: _Collective_ _Body_ _Org_ _Group_
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Organization
Email
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: To specify the electronic mail address for communication with the object the vCard represents. Use the hasEmail object property.
For use in LSO: This property links a lso:LibraryService to a gr:PriceSpecification.
This links a gr:Offering to a gr:PriceSpecification or specifications...
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has price specification (0..*)

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Defines a single component of a higher-level service
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Service Component
Dienstleistungsbestandteil

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The closing hour of the gr:Location on the given gr:DayOfWeek...
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: closes (1..1)

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: An object representing an organization. An organization is a single entity, and might represent a business or government, a department or division within a business or government, a club, an association, or the like.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Organization
country name
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The country name associated with the address of the object

This property specifies the amount of money for a price per unit, shipping charges, or payment charges. The currency and other relevant details are attached to the respective gr:PriceSpecification etc...
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has currency value (0..1)
Copier or Scanner
Kopierer oder Scanner
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A service provided to enable users making personal copies or scans of documents.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Lokale Bestandsbenutzung
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A kind of service provided to take use of the library’s media collection.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Local Usage Service

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: To specify the telephone number for telephony communication with the object
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has telephone
Abteilung als Servicepunkt
Department as Point Of Service
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: defines a department as a physical site where a local service is available.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Gebäude als Servicepunkt
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: defines a building as a physical site where a local service is available.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Building as Point Of Service
Lizenz
Licence
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: class defines conditions for access to databases given by licenses.
The postal code associated with the address of the object
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: postal code
Internetbasierte Dienstleistung
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A kind of online service provided on the library’s website.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Web Based Service

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: To specify the electronic mail address for communication with the object
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has email

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The day of the week, used to specify to which day the opening hours of a gr:OpeningHoursSpecification refer.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Day of Week
Unit price specification
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A unit price specification is a conceptual entity that specifies the price asked for a given gr:Offering by the respective gr:Business Entity. An offering may be linked to multiple unit price specifications that specify alternative prices for non-overlapping sets of conditions (e.g. quantities or sales regions) or with differing validity periods...

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Organizational Unit as Point Of Service
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: defines an organizational unit as a physical site where a local service is available.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Teilorganisation als Servicepunkt

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: To specify the organizational name associated with the object
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: organization name

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The opening hour of the gr:Location on the given gr:DayOf- Week...
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: opens (1..1)
street address
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The street address associated with the address of the object
To specify the components of the delivery address for the object
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Address
